# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=114.5, y=-28.666666666666668)
Consists of steam engine(position x=117.5, y=-30.5), boiler(position x=111.5, y=-32.0), and offshore pump(position x=106.5, y=-32.5)

### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.0, y=-82.0) and a furnace at position(x=41.0, y=-80.0)
- Burner mining drill (position x=39.5, y=-79.5) and a furnace at position(x=41.0, y=-80.0)
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.5, y=-78.5) and a furnace at position(x=60.0, y=-60.0)

### Copper cable factory
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.0, y=-82.0) and a furnace at position(x=41.0, y=-80.0)
- Assembling machine at unknown position and inserter at position(x=39.5, y=-79.5) that puts into assembling machine
- Belt group (position x=40.5, y=-83.5) that connects the furnace at position(x=41.0, y=-80.0) to unknown assembling machine

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner entities
- Ensure that burner entities have fuel before using them
- Examples of burner entities include burner-mining-drill and burner-inserter

### Errors when using steam engine
- Ensure that steam engine is connected to a power network before using it

### Errors when using offshore pump
- Ensure that offshore pump has a pipe group connected to it before using it

### Errors when using belt group
- Ensure that belt group is not empty before using it

### Errors when using transport belt
- Ensure that transport belt is working before using it

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined by the agent. 
No important variables have been assigned. 
No functions have been invoked.
